resources.string: The next ten questions will help you determine just how well you know your Korean food, and will give you a big head start when you are next watching \'mokbang\' videos on Youtube.
1. What is the name of the food in the image below?
2. What is the name of the food in the image below?
3. What is the name of the food in the image below?
4. What is the name of the food in the image below?
5. What is the name of the food in the image below?
Both Ramyun and Ramyeon would be accepted as the answer.
6. Time for a challenge! What are the names of all of the foods in the image below? Check all that apply.
The correct answer is Kimchi, Bap, and Gug. There is no bread, and happily there are no elephants in this image either.
7. What is the name of the food in the image below?
The correct answer is Kimchi Jeon.
8. What words could be used to refer to the food in the image below?
The correct answers are Sangchu and Yachae.
Now it\'s getting really tough! We\'re not going to give you any hints. Type in the answers to the next two questions.
9. What is the name of the food in the image below? Type it in the box underneath the image.
Any answer containing \'gochu\' would be accepted.
10. What is the polite way to say thank you after a delicious meal?
Any answer containing all of \'Jal\', \'M\', and \'Subnida\' would be accepted.
Please note that all of the images in this quiz were sourced without permisission from www.maangchi.com and are used here for educational purposes only.
